_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

ExpressionOfInterestRequest.description: An expression of interest to a tendering process. An Economic Operator can demonstrate interest in a tendering process issuing an Expression Of Interest document to the contracting party. Upon reception, the Contracting Party registers the interest of the Economic Operator sending the relevant information for the tendering process.

ExpressionOfInterestRequest.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Details
ExpressionOfInterestRequest.description: An expression of interest to a tendering process. An Economic Operator can demonstrate interest in a tendering process issuing an Expression Of Interest document to the contracting party. Upon reception, the Contracting Party registers the interest of the Economic Operator sending the relevant information for the tendering process.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Expression Of Interest Request. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: The earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Expression Of Interest Request. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

ContractFolderID.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Contract Folder Identifier. Identifier
ContractFolderID.description: An identifier, assigned by the sender, for the process file (i.e., record) to which this document belongs.

IssueDate.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

ContractName.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Contract Name. Name
ContractName.description: Short title of a contract associated with this Expression of Interest.

PreferredLanguageLocaleCode.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Preferred Language_ Locale Code. Code
PreferredLanguageLocaleCode.description: A code signifying the locale in which the language in the required documents is preferred.

Note.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

ValidityPeriod.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: The period for which the expression of interest is valid.

DocumentReference.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to another document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

EconomicOperatorParty.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Economic Operator Party
EconomicOperatorParty.description: The Economic Operator issuing the expression of interest.

ContractingParty.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Contracting Party
ContractingParty.description: The Contracting Party or the contracting parties in case of joint procurement.

ProcurementProject.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Procurement Project
ProcurementProject.description: An overall definition of this procurement project.

ProcurementProjectLotReference.title: Expression Of Interest Request. Procurement Project Lot Reference
ProcurementProjectLotReference.description: One of the procurement project lots into which this contract can be split.
